attributes.action: Order a criminal investigation into possible offences that have been committed by some MPs when making expense claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent expense claims that have been highlighted in the press appear to be criminal offences. Rather than saying it was a mistake and paying it back, the police should be called in to carry out an investigation into any criminal acts that may have been committed.
It is noted that this is only a minority of MP's, but they are ruining the reputation of British democracy.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
